channel.title: CVE Feed for AiLux -- imx6 bundle
channel.description: The latest CVEs for AiLux -- imx6 bundle

item.title: CVE-2023-45593|2024-09-30T09:58:46.475Z -- ailux -- imx6%20bundle
item.description: A CWE-693 “Protection Mechanism Failure” vulnerability in the embedded Chromium browser (concerning the handling of alternative URLs, other than “ http://localhost” ) allows a physical attacker to read arbitrary files on the file system, alter the configuration of the embedded browser, and have other unspecified impacts to the confidentiality, integrity, and availability of the device. This issue affects: AiLux imx6 bundle below version imx6_1.0.7-2.

item.title: CVE-2023-45598|2024-09-30T10:00:12.338Z -- ailux -- imx6%20bundle
item.description: A CWE-862 “Missing Authorization” vulnerability in the “measure” functionality of the web application allows a remote unauthenticated attacker to access confidential measure information. This issue affects: AiLux imx6 bundle below version imx6_1.0.7-2.

item.title: CVE-2023-45596|2024-09-30T09:59:30.125Z -- ailux -- imx6%20bundle
item.description: A CWE-862 “Missing Authorization” vulnerability in the “file_configuration” functionality of the web application allows a remote unauthenticated attacker to access confidential configuration files. This issue affects: AiLux imx6 bundle below version imx6_1.0.7-2.
